5 31 66 73 51 63 91 IIs IIl 1932 104,731 5,764 71 24 535 28 58 64 35 54 69 107 100 1933 109,905 7,612 120 18 584 33 67 67 47 91 54 117 118 1934 124,891 I1,916 172 37 690 46 83 76 73 131 109 138 164 1935 143,013 16,446 260 71 994 62 97 88 IO1 198 208 199 221 1936 158,407 19,216 380 97 1,294 88 107 97 118 289 285 259 314 1937 184,489 19,849 526 128 1,621 156 119 113 122 401 374 325 557 186,186 22,656 187,956 22,508 184,354 19,141 186,531 20,836 187,920 20,480 190,482 20,758 166,059 18,318 1929 1930 1931 1932 1933 1934 1935 1936 1937 163,441 142,695 118,634 104,731 109,905 124,891 143,013 158,407 184,489 186,186 187,956 184,354 186,531 187,920 190,482 166,059 16,246 11,538 8,292 55764 77, Ons II,916 16,446 19,216 19,849 131 95 83 71 I20 172 260 380 526 34 32 31 18 37 7a 97 128 I, I, 499 546 575 535 584 690 994 294 621 Io0o 107 119 Io0o 87 73 64 67 76 88 97 113 100 yal 51 35 47 73 IOI 118 I22 I0o Te 63 54 91 131 198 289 401 I0o 94 91 69 54  109  208  374  Sources: Statistisches Handbuch von Deutschland; Statisisches Jahrbuch fuer das Deutsche Reich (various); R. Wagenfuehr, Die deutsche Industrie im Kriege (Berlin, 1954) Table A3.
